columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event

columns.name: Application
columns.description: Application that performed the recorded action

columns.name: AppInstanceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the instance of an application

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: AccountId
columns.description: Identifier for the account as found by Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps

columns.name: AccountDisplayName
columns.description: Name displayed in the address book entry for the account user

columns.name: IsAdminOperation
columns.description: Indicates whether the activity was performed by an administrator
